div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 85 Chiliomodi, 18 km. S of Corinth, 1932 (239) Burial: 306 B.C. (Ravel) Contents. 196 AR. Pot hoard Leucas: 9 st. Corinth: 70 st.; 84 dr. Ptolemy I: 21 tetradr.; 12 dr. Disposition: Athens 17 (Leucas 2, Corinth 9, Ptolemy 6); New York 2 (Ptolemy dr.); Oxford 1 (Ptolemy dr.) BCH 1933, p. 238 â€ Ravel, TINC, pp. 98-108, illus. Jenkins, ANSMN 9 (1960), pp. 32-4 (Ptolemaic issues)
